title: Task Manager X
description: TaskManagerX is a MERN stack task management system allowing users to organize, categorize, and filter tasks efficiently. It features user authentication, role-based access, and showcases seamless integration between the frontend and backend.

title: YelpCamp
description: This is full-stack project, implementing user login and registration, allowing users to add, review, upload images, and delete campgrounds.

title: Netflix-Clone
description: A Netflix-Clone utilizing React, JavaScript, Express, Mongo
